TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void NameSpaceEvents_OptionsPagesAddEventHandler(PropertyPages Pages, MAPIFolder Folder);
.class public auto ansi sealed NameSpaceEvents_OptionsPagesAddEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub NameSpaceEvents_OptionsPagesAddEventHandler(Pages As PropertyPages, Folder As MAPIFolder)
public delegate void NameSpaceEvents_OptionsPagesAddEventHandler(PropertyPages ^ Pages, MAPIFolder ^ Folder);

param.name: Pages
param.span: A coleção de páginas de propriedade adicionada à caixa de diálogo. Essa coleção inclui apenas páginas de propriedade personalizadas. Ela não inclui páginas de propriedade padrão do Microsoft Outlook.

span.span: The collection of property pages that have been added to the dialog box. This collection includes only custom property pages. It does not include standard Microsoft Outlook property pages.

param.name: Folder
param.span: Este argumento é usado apenas com o objeto Folder. O objeto de pasta para a qual está sendo aberta a caixa de diálogo de Propriedades.

span.span: This argument is only used with the Folder object. The Folder object for which the Properties dialog box is being opened.

summary.span: This is a delegate for an event in the corresponding object. After implementing a callback method for the event, use this delegate to connect the callback method to the event. If there are multiple versions of the event interface, this delegate connects the callback method for the event in the specified version of Outlook.

span.span: This is a delegate for an event in the corresponding object. After implementing a callback method for the event, use this delegate to connect the callback method to the event. If there are multiple versions of the event interface, this delegate connects the callback method for the event in the specified version of Outlook.
